name: Space Isolation
description:
Alone… you wish.

You are an abandoned engineer and must collect the required power cells in order to power your ship. However take care. For the other players will be trying to stop you. and if they catch you.... the consequences will be fatal.

Space Isolation is an online game for up to 4 players. Take turns playing as the survivor in an effort to reach the score limit.

  • WASD/Arrow Keys to move
  • "T" to chat
  • "0" (zero) key to toggle fullscreen (download only)
